Package edu.utsa.cs3443.msaid

Class MedicationAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MedicationAdapter.MedicineViewHolder>
edu.utsa.cs3443.msaid.MedicationAdapter
public class MedicationAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MedicationAdapter.MedicineViewHolder>
Adapter class for managing and displaying a list of medicines in a RecyclerView. Provides functionality to handle click events based on the page context (delete or detail).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MedicationAdapter.MedicineViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for holding the views of a single medicine item.
    static interface 
    MedicationAdapter.OnMedicineClickListener
    Interface for handling click events on medicine items.

    • MedicationAdapter

      public MedicationAdapter(android.content.Context context, List<Medicine> medicines, MedicationAdapter.OnMedicineClickListener onMedicineClickListener, User currentUser, boolean isDeletePage)
      Constructor for MedicationAdapter.
      Parameters:
      context - the context in which the adapter operates.
      medicines - the list of Medicine objects to display.
      onMedicineClickListener - a listener for handling click events on a medicine item.
      currentUser - the current user managing the medicines.
      isDeletePage - flag indicating if the adapter is used in the delete page context.
